Pre-Game Insights: India, with three straight wins, has already secured a spot in the Super 8 stage of the tournament, and will hope to sign off the group phase in style.
Heavy rains and flooding around the Central Broward Regional Park mean that the status of the fixture has been in doubt.
Canada, playing in their first T20 World Cup, showed their grit with a win over Ireland.
Opener Aaron Johnson is one to watch.
Facing a strong Indian side will be a tough challenge.

Virat Kohli's form has been a big talking point in the buildup for India. After a spectacular season in the Indian Premier League, Kohli has struggled in the World Cup so far, scoring only five runs in three matches.
